summary: 1979  was a common year starting on Monday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
Brian Alexander "B. A." Robertson  is a Scottish musician, actor, composer and songwriter. He had a string of hits in the late 1970s and early 1980s, characterised by catchy pop tunes and jaunty, humorous lyrics, most notably "Bang Bang", a tongue-in-cheek commentary on famous historical and fictional couples. He has also written songs for Mike Rutherford including "The Living Years" which was a number 1 hit in several countries. He has also written music for films and been a television presenter.
^ IMDb database
title: B.A. Robertson
